parameters:
I'll be with Light-kun, so both of you can rest
assured.
If Azami-san is watching over, then it's okay!

It's not good to stay too long, so shall we go to
the village chief's place quickly?

Both of you, take care. If there's anything I can
help with, don't hesitate to tell me.

Thank you, Azami-san. I'll rely on you at that
time!
If anything happens, feel free to tell me anytime.
If anything happens, feel free to tell me anytime.
If anything happens, feel free to tell me anytime.
If anything happens, feel free to tell me anytime.
If anything happens, feel free to tell me anytime.
It seems like there's a small gap in the wall.
I can barely see Light sleeping on the bed.
It seems like there's a small gap in the wall.
It seems like he's calm now.

I was planning to have Light-kun help me with some
work, so I went to pick him up at home, but...

I found Light-kun collapsed on the way, so I
hurriedly brought him home.

I'm sure Light is serious, so even if he's not
feeling well, he wanted to keep his promise.

Due to the fact that Light was picked up by the
village chief in the past, it seems like he has
been taking the lead in doing work in place of the
female Azami-san and the elderly village chief.

It seems like he collapsed on his way there, even
though he had promised to help with the work
today.

When I brought Light-kun in, Lira-chan helped me
too.
After that, I asked \n[1]-kun to come over.

I wonder if \n[1]-kun knows more about Light-kun
than I do...

I couldn't think of any reason for him to collapse
just from spending time together normally
yesterday.

Yes, I'm sorry for causing a commotion since this
morning.

No, no, it's mutual help when we're in trouble!
Right, \n[1]?
Hehe, they really get along well, don't they?

For now, he's okay, so I'll let Light-kun know as
soon as he wakes up.

For now, it seems like there's no serious issue.
I'll come back later to check on him again.

Also, it seems like grandpa has something to do,
so could you call out to him before he leaves?

It seems like the village chief has something to
discuss. Let's go to where the village chief is on
the first floor.

You're probably just tired from your usual daily
fatigue, huh?
Should I leave you alone for now?
I reassure you that there's no need to worry.
...Thank you, I'll rest quietly for now.
I encourage Light, who has a troubled expression.

It seems like he's thinking about something. I
should refrain from talking to him for now.
Good morning, Azami-san! How is Light doing?

Both of them, good morning. Light-kun just woke up
this morning.

I heard the general situation from Azami-san...
about my curse.

Thank you for looking for a way to cure both of
us... both of you.

When in trouble, we help each other! I'm sure if
we were the ones cursed, Light would do the same
for us!

Alright! Then let's go explore with full energy
today too, \n[1]!
If possible, Lira-chan, could I ask for your help?

Is that so!? ...I understand. In that case, I will
help you!

I'll answer that it's okay and make sure not to
cause any trouble for Azami-san.

What's that supposed to mean! Even though I may
look like this, I'm a reliable person, you know! I
can help out!
No, no, please don't worry about it!

Well then, \n[1], take care, okay? ...There might
be something like yesterday happening again.
Be careful and don't push yourself too hard, okay?

Now is the time to do our best! Let's work
together!

events.name: プロローグ終わりイベ

parameters:
I suppose if both of you are already up, then I
guess your health is already okay, right?

Ah, thanks to everyone, I've been able to rest
quite a bit, so I can't just keep lying around
sleeping forever.

And besides, didn't \n[1] and Miiru bring back some
medicinal herbs yesterday?

I suppose if both of you are already up, then I
guess your health is already okay, right? Thank
you, \n[1].
In that case, thank goodness and relief.

So, about what's going to happen from now on, I'm
thinking of joining the exploration too.

Even if we call it a curse, it's not like our
bodies are unable to move or anything like that.

On the contrary, it feels like I have more energy
welling up inside me than before.
It's reassuring to have Light around.

That's right, there's nothing we can't do
together.

Hehe, the two of you really get along well, don't
you?

When pointed out again, it's a little
embarrassing.
Of course, we're best friends after all.
I strongly nod at those words

Both of you, don't push yourselves too hard... If
anything happens, you can rely on me.
Huh! Oh, um... Thank you in advance.
Um, well then, shall we go right away, \n[1]?
